info.title: SpeakerText
info.description: SpeakerText's transcription services may be accessed through a RESTful API. It is possible to initiate transcription and receive transcription results through the API. Anyone with a SpeakerText account can use the API.

post.description: This method is used to initiate one or more SpeakerText transcriptions.

parameters.name: pingback_url
parameters.description: If present, we will make a POST request to this URL upon transcript completion. The body of the request will have three keys: transcript_id (SpeakerTexts transcript id), ref_id (the media reference id or video id you specified in the original POST), and content (the HTML transcript for CaptionBox).

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: (JSON) single source object or array of source objects

get.description: This method is used to retrieve the results of SpeakerText transcriptions.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: dfxp, srt, txt, xml, or html (for CaptionBox). When not specified, defaults to txt. Case-insensitive.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transcript ID returned to you upon transcript creation
